Uses of Class
org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.AbstractPort

  • Packages that use AbstractPort 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel
    Defines classes and interfaces for workflow level entities and events.
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.impl
    Implementation package for workflow entities
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.impl
    Contains specific implementations of the Activity Ports, together with an implementation of ActivityPortBuilder which is responsible for building them.

    • Uses of AbstractPort in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel

      Subclasses of AbstractPort in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractOutputPort
      Simple implementation of OutputPort, extends AbstractPort and adds the granular depth bean getter.

    • Uses of AbstractPort in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.impl

      Subclasses of AbstractPort in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractEventHandlingInputPort
      Extends AbstractPort with the getIncomingLink method and an additional implementation method to set the incoming data link
      class  AbstractFilteringInputPort
      Abstract superclass for filtering input ports, extend and implement the pushXXX methods to configure behaviour
      class  BasicEventForwardingOutputPort
      Extension of AbstractOutputPort implementing EventForwardingOutputPort
      class  DataflowInputPortImpl 

    • Uses of AbstractPort in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.impl

      Subclasses of AbstractPort in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActivityInputPortImpl
      An input port on an Activity instance.
      class  ActivityOutputPortImpl
      An output port on an Activity instance, used as a bean to hold port name, depth and granular depth properties.
